textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   When Phil gives the Nikon D80 an 8 and gives the Canon 40D a 9, does this really mean that all things being equal the pictures from the Nikon won't be as good as the Canon? Or does all it mean that without any post processing on the computer the jpeg image will be better on the Canon than the Nikon, but tells you nothing about the image quality if you use editing? I am looking at the Nikon, but when I make the jump from P and S to DSLR, don't want to feel that
